== Introduction to Kubuntu 8.04 ==
Kubuntu 8.04, the Hardy Heron, is the next release of Kubuntu, scheduled to be released towards the end of April 2008. This release will introduce the future of desktop computing by incorporating the new KDE 4 desktop as well as providing continued maintainenance and support for the KDE 3.5 desktop. With the news concerning the release of the KDE 4 desktop, it was decided by Canonical that Kubuntu 8.04 would '''not''' be a Long Term Support (LTS) release.

== Helping Kubuntu ==
Are you interesting in helping with the development of Kubuntu? If so, Kubuntu is looking for the following:
* <nowiki>[[DocumentationTeam| Documentation writers]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[TranslatingUbuntu| Translators]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[BugSquad| Bug triagers]]</nowiki>
* IRC, Mailing Lists, and Forums supporters
* <nowiki>[[MOTU| Application packagers]]</nowiki>
* Application developers
No matter your skillset, Kubuntu has a job waiting for you! Check out HelpingKubuntu for more information.
